There were no other sightings in Cumberland on or around July 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend, my brother, and I were in my front yard going to go down the street to get some kids to play with. All of a sudden I saw something in the sky. I was sort of freaked out so I ran inside to get my digital camera. When I came out it was still there and I took 3 pictures but only 1 turned out. We were amazed by this so we kept watching it for about 5 more minutes. It was going in a straight line left and it didnt make a noise. It also changed shapes. First it was like a disc the it turned flat. Finally we kept watching it and we looked at it until it disappeared into the air right in front of our eyes. When we first saw it I thought it was a bunch of balloons but they would of been floating upwards.
